title.narrative: 5.3 CROSS-SECTORAL ISSUES

description.narrative: Cross-sectoral issues: Gender, Emergency, which contributes to Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Communication And Advocacy, Cross Sectoral - Children With Disabilities, Cross Sectoral - Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme effectively designed, coordinated, managed and supported in line with quality programme standards to attain results for children.Â
